name: @moyal/js-test
description: A lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript testing utility. This project is framework-agnostic and usable in both browser and Node.js environments.
author: Ilan Moyal

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.pack: npm run pack:local && npm run pack:preview
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run publish:npm
